author: Ninjamoy1234
title: A Perfect DotD Cole
review:
Wow this Limited Edition Cole has all that you need:

  • Sword
  • Hair
  • Hood
  • Hammer

  The pieces are great, a Cole with the scar and without the RX thing.

author: Lego_fan_
title: EARTH!
review:
This Lego Cole magazine set is a great addition to any Lego Ninjago collection.

Cole appears to be in his day of the departed/season 7 era suit and comes with the option for his hair or hood. He also includes a sword holder on his back with a katana. His main wepon though is a big hammer which is brick built. My only problem with these magazine gift sets is that they never come with instructions( not that you need it with this. 

Overall i would tell all loyal Lego Ninjago fans that they must get this great set for the collection.
